```{r}
library(sparkworker)
library(sparklyr)

sc <- spark_connect(master = "local", version = "2.0.1")
iris_sdf <- spark_dataframe(sdf_copy_to(sc, iris))

sdf_lapply(sc, iris_sdf, funtion(rows) {
  rows$Petal_Width <- rows$Petal_Width + 1
  rows
})

spark_disconnect(sc)
```
